name: Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity

– all drawings are the latest revision

1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents - OHSMP, EMP, TMS, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - Conformance of hydroseed mix with grass seed properties table 720.045
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed, Data sheet
Acceptance Criteria - Grass seed shall be sown at minimum 100 kg/Ha (if drilled) or 200 kg/Ha (if broadcast)
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed, Recievable Inspection Checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Germination rate shall be minimum 80% cover within 8 weeks and 95% cover within 3 months of sowing.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - If germination has not been achieved in any grassed area within 8 weeks, then the area(s) shall be reseeded with the specified grass seed mix
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria - Lot map showing location and area of hydroseed
Reference Documents - Drawings and drawing registers Section 720
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
